question_id: Daerah asal mana yang memiliki jumlah masakan di bawah rata-rata jumlah masakan per daerah? Tampilkan nama daerah dan total masakannya.
sql_query:
SELECT
  m.asal_daerah,
  COUNT(m.kode_masakan) AS total_masakan
FROM Masakan AS m
GROUP BY
  m.asal_daerah
HAVING
  COUNT(m.kode_masakan) < (
    SELECT
      AVG(jumlah)
    FROM Recipe_Bahan AS rb
    GROUP BY
      m.kode_masakan
  )
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
  m.asal_daerah,
  COUNT(m.kode_masakan) AS total_masakan
FROM Masakan AS m
GROUP BY
  m.asal_daerah
HAVING
  COUNT(m.kode_masakan) < (
    SELECT
      AVG(jumlah)
    FROM Recipe_Bahan AS rb
    GROUP BY
      m.kode_masakan
  );
```
